name: Mona Lisa
author: Leonardo da Vinci
description: A half-length portrait of a woman with an enigmatic smile.

name: The Starry Night
author: Vincent van Gogh
description: A view of the night sky over the village of Saint-Rémy-de-Provence.

name: Guernica
author: Pablo Picasso
description: A large painting depicting the bombing of the Basque town of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.

name: The Scream
author: Edvard Munch
description: A painting of a person with an agonized expression against a blood red sky.

name: The Creation of Adam
author: Michelangelo
description: A fresco painting depicting God reaching out to create Adam in the Sistine Chapel.

name: The Last Supper
author: Leonardo da Vinci
description: A mural painting depicting the Last Supper of Jesus Christ with his apostles.

name: The Venus de Milo
author: Unknown
description: A marble statue of a woman without arms.

name: The Thinker
author: Auguste Rodin
description: A bronze sculpture of a man sitting in a thoughtful pose.

name: The Kiss
author: Gustav Klimt
description: A painting of a couple kissing in a gold and red setting.

name: The Water Lilies
author: Claude Monet
description: A series of paintings of water lilies in a pond.

name: The Birth of Venus
author: Sandro Botticelli
description: A painting depicting the goddess Venus emerging from the sea.

name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
author: Johannes Vermeer
description: A painting of a young woman wearing a pearl earring.

name: The Night Watch
author: Rembrandt
description: A large painting of a city guard company by Rembrandt.

name: American Gothic
author: Grant Wood
description: A painting depicting a farmer and his daughter in front of a Gothic-style house.
